schema.name: 2018/11/06 Healthyfied Caulirice

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse 47.50 g of Adlai Rice (Job's Tears) under cold water until the water runs clear.
Chop 67 g of Capsicum Green and 200 g of Cauliflower into small pieces.
In a skillet, melt 2 tbsp of Butter over medium heat.
Add the minced Garlic to the skillet and sauté for about 1 minute or until fragrant. Cook Time: 1M

Add the chopped Capsicum Green and Cauliflower to the skillet, sprinkle with 0.25 teaspoon of Salt and 0.25 teaspoon of ground Pepper. Cook for about 7-10 minutes until the vegetables are tender. Cook Time: 10M
Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions, then set aside.
Combine the cooked Adlai Rice with the sautéed vegetables. Mix well and adjust the seasoning if needed.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Caulirice recipe is perfect for those looking to enjoy a delicious, nutritious meal without the guilt. With its low-carb and low-sugar tags, it's ideal for a healthy lifestyle. Featuring a blend of flavors with Adlai Rice, Capsicum Green, Cauliflower, and a hint of garlic, this dish is not just healthy but also incredibly flavorful. Dive into the world of healthy recipes with this delightful dish.
